title: HeyToo 9inch Glitter Women Handheld Fan With Shining Transparent Fan Rib for Wedding,Church,Festival,Dance,Party Prom,Club,EDM Accessory Black
descriptions:
**Product Listing: HeyToo 9inch Glitter Women Handheld Fan**

**Product Description:**

Add a touch of elegance and glamour to your outfit with the HeyToo 9inch Glitter Women Handheld Fan. Made from high-quality glitter fabric and polyester fan rib, this beautiful fan is perfect for special occasions and everyday use.

**Key Features:**

- Made from glitter fabric and polyester fan rib for durability and style
- Unique design with colorful shining glitter fabric for an elegant look
- Easy to open and use, with a lightweight and sturdy design
- Perfect for various occasions such as weddings, festivals, parties, concerts, and more
- Can also be used as a summer accessory, beach accessory, or wall decoration

**Product Specifications:**

- Material: Glitter Fabric and Polyester Fan Rib
- Size: 23cm (9.05inch) in length, 42cm (16.5inch) in width when opened
- Color: Black
- Design: Glitter fabric with transparent fan rib for a stunning effect
- Ease of use: Easy to open, low noise level, lightweight, and sturdy
- Occasions: Rave, Festivals, EDM, Party, Pride, Dance, Techno, Freaky, Cosplay, Disco, Concerts, Wedding, and more
- Additional uses: Wall decoration, summer accessory, beach, seaside, nights out

**Why You'll Love This Product:**

- Perfect gift idea for friends and family who love fashion and accessories
- Unique and elegant design that adds a touch of glamour to your outfit
- Easy to use and carry, making it perfect for everyday use
- Durable and long-lasting, with high-quality materials used in its construction

**Order Now:**

Get your HeyToo 9inch Glitter Women Handheld Fan today and add a touch of elegance to your outfit. Order now and experience the perfect combination of style, functionality, and durability.
